article.title: CSC To Provide Healthcare Claims Processing For The Department Of Veterans Affairs
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs has awarded CSC a contract to provide health care claims processing systems and services. The task order has a one-year base period and four one-year options. Under the contract, CSC and its subcontractor, Plexis Healthcare Systems, will provide the Department of Veterans Affairs Financial Services Center with software for a healthcare claims processing system.
